greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Denominator of phi(prime(n)-1)/(prime(n)-1), where phi is Euler's totient function and prime(n) is the n-th prime.
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
maple: with(numtheory): A241195:=n->denom(phi(ithprime(n)-1) / (ithprime(n)-1)): seq(A241195(n), n=1..100); # _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Apr 06 2015
program: (PARI) lista(nn) = forprime(p=2, nn, print1(denominator(eulerphi(p-1)/(p-1)), ", ")); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jan 03 2015
results.author: _T. D. Noe_, Apr 17 2014
